General.Name: Pylon Public Company Limited
General.Description: Pylon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides construction services in Thailand. It offers foundation services, including bored piles, ground improvement, diaphragm walls/ barrette pile, and other construction services. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
